Welcome to InCens’ documentation

InCens contains python codes to compute information transfer through central dogma reactions as a function of the central dogma rates constants.

Author

Swarnavo Sarkar

If you are using any part of this package, please cite: S. Sarkar and J. Rammohan, Nearly maximal information gain due to time integration in central dogma reactions, bioRxiv (2022)
